title: Johnstown Flood National Memorial: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Fee Free Veteran's Day Weekend and Winter Hours of Operation for the Five Western Pennsylvania National Parks Social Media Policy for Johnstown Flood NM (pdf) Jeff Reinbold Named Superintendent of National Parks of Western Pennsylvania, Effective January 1, 2012 Effective January 1, 2012, Jeff Reinbold became the new Superintendent of the National Parks of Western Pennsylvania. Keith Newlin, who had been serving as acting Superintendent since February 2011, returned to his role as Deputy Superintendent.         Other documents scanned for your use include: Johnstown Flood National Memorial Alternative Transportation Study Johnstown Flood National Memorial Visitor Study
